cmp: 麻 ((to have) pins and needles/tingling/hemp/numb/to bother)
mng: grindstone, to grind, to turn round
to rub, to grind, to polish, to sharpen, to wear down, to die out, to waste time, to pester, to insist

exm.mng: milling, to grind, to polish by grinding, to abrade, whetstone, pestle
to wear down, to sap, to whittle away, to while away, to idle away
a torment, a trial, tribulation, a cross (to bear), well-tried
to sharpen on grindstone, to improve oneself by practice
wear and tear, wearing out by friction
to ponder, to mull over, to think through, Taiwan pr. [zhuo2 mo2]
